name: Chasmal Fear
storyline: Set in the near future, the first advanced underwater facility has been founded under the waves of the ocean. Built partially above a chasm and inside a massive ocean cliff, this massive underwater city was meant to serve both science as well as provide a new experience for tourists. However recently, the signal has been lost. Military specialist/s equipped with advanced suits and weaponry have been sent to investigate and assess the situation.
summary: Chasmal Fear is a next-gen FPS action horror game built in Unreal Engine 5 from the perspective of a body camera. Manage limited resources, make smart choices which affect your playthrough and survive monsters that mutate to get stronger. Played as singleplayer or Co-Op with 2 players.
